text: The Five Megillot are five books found in the Hebrew Bible (also called Tanakh) under Ketuvim, which are read out during Holy Days of Judaism. They are: *Song of Songs used during Passover, *Ruth used on Shavuot, *Lamentations used on the 9th of Av, *Ecclesiastes used during Sukkot, *Esther for the holiday of Purim. ==References== Category:Books of the Hebrew Bible
title: Five Megillot
